recipesJson.name: Mouthy Smash
recipesJson.author: xxMikaxx
recipesJson.description:
When I first started vaping, I loved Smash Mouth by Humble. I tried to recreate that first love feeling and ended up creating something deeper. 

I tried using lower %s but it didn't come out quite right.  Feel free to lower or omit the sweetener. If you want it to be more authentic, in reality you would use 1.5 - 2%.

Good off the shake but 3-5 days steeping is better as usual. I tend to mix my liquids as needed so I rarely steep anything more than a couple days.

reviews.text: I found it to be a great vape..Shisha was a bit overpowering so I made a second batch with (FA) Red Touch as a sub.. It is just as good only gets rid of an off note that I find in Shisha.. All in all it is good on the SNV.
